duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate a roll-off truck to collect and deliver waste from customer sites to post-collection facilities.
Conduct daily pre- and post-trip inspections, complete vehicle condition reports, and interact courteously with customers along the route.
Maintain a clean customer site and safety along roads and highways, and submit required reports as per company policy and regulations.
Use map and GPS to locate service addresses, follow safe operating practices, and ensure proper operation of the truck.
Monitor operations, maintain vehicle cleanliness, and report incidents or accidents to supervisors immediately.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED (Commercial Driver's License required)
